conversations.content: You've led us on quite the merry chase, but there's nowhere left to run.
We know you're the one who stole into our castle, thief.
Rgh... Like a pack of dogs, you are.
The authorities will give you ample time to reflect on your actions. Now, come—
Justiiice SCREAMING COMET SMAAASH!
Huh?! What is— *cough* *cough*
I can't see anything through this cloud of dust... Hey! You there! Wait!
I dunno who you are, pal, but thanks! So long, suckers!
Oh, blast it all! He's getting away! ...You! Explain yourself! Who are you, and what do you think you're doing?!
Heh. I'm glad you asked...
The name is Karl. The Karlsplosion! The Inkarldescent! And what I do...is JUSTICE!
...I beg your pardon?
My name is synonymous with justice the continent over! ...Well, it will be soon.
You there, villain!
Er, you seem to be pointing at me, but—
Yes, you! I saw the whole thing from afar!
Ganging up on that poor defenseless man along with your henchman. For shame!
The world may turn a blind eye to your crimes, but my justice never blinks!
Prepare yourself! Justiiice SHATTER!
Okay, hang on just a second here!
He dodged?!
You fear the blade of justice?! The true mark of a villain is ever cowardice!
The man you saw just now is a thief. He broke into our castle and raided our stores, so we were trying to catch him.
HNWHAAAT?!
Had he merely been hungry and stealing food, we might have turned a blind eye, but next he ransacked our storehouse.
He's helped himself to valuables from the nearby townsfolk of late, too.
GRNK?!
And we finally had him pinned down. ...Until you arrived, that is.
...One second.
LEMME GO!
Ha HA! THIS was the villain all along!
I brought him around the local villages to have him identified, and there can be no mistaking this. Justice...is served!
Justice is...very, very fast.
You just left. I mean, JUST now.
Justice rides upon a screaming fireball!
And today, so does epiphany... For I have seen it!
The flames of justice burn bright in you. I must join my flame to yours and stoke it into a raging JUSTICE INFERNO!
That sounds extremely dangerous. Are you proposing to join us, or to engage in arson?
If it's the former, I'm all for it. The more the merrier.
Arson, er...less so.
Haaah ha ha ha! Then let us join forces and set our sights...
...on JUSTICE!!!
Well met, dear grandmother type! That's quite the load you're carrying. Allow me to help you!
Oh, you needn't bother. I'm nearly home.
No, no. I insist...for JUSTICE!
Ahh! Get back here! Somebody help! Thief! THIEF!
Are you lost, miss? I shall deliver you safely home!
No, I'm meeting my sweetheart here.
Then I shall deliver you to him... with JUSTICE!
GAH!
HEY! Let my girlfriend go, you monster! Somebody help! Kidnapper! KIDNAPPER!
Someone's dumped a mountain of garbage here!
I'll see it to the junkyard straightaway... because JUSTICE!
All my furniture! I just put it outside to dust it off as part of my annual cleaning! Somebody help! Idiot! IDIOT!
...We've received a stack of complaints from the nearby villages.
＂Kindly put a leash on the one going about screaming 'JUSTICE!'＂ ＂Stop the bad justice man.＂ They go on...
Incomprehensible. I've merely been carrying out justice!
Your intentions are admirable, but your methods are a bit...extreme.
Can't you tone it down just a bit?
Impossible!
Justice burns hotter than the sun! My passion cannot be bridled!
Oh, I see. He's one of those types who's so full of himself he's unwilling to listen.
Hmm. Let's try a different approach. Karl, what was it that first sparked this flame inside you?
I grew up in a terribly poor village. Nearly a ghost town, really.
What little we had was stripped from us by outlaws.
...Until the day HE showed up.
He defeated the band of rogues who tormented us in the blink of an eye. He saved our village!
When I looked at him, I saw justice!
And I knew that was what I had to become.
So I put my back to home and set off on a journey to go justice all the justice I could justice!
That DOES sound quite justice!
But why did that man fight the outlaws plaguing your village, do you think?
Isn't it obvious?! For JUSTICE!
Taking down villains needs no reason!
Are you sure?
I wonder if his aim was to bring a bit of happiness to a suffering village. To put the smiles back on your faces.
Smiles, you say?
I wonder if that's what you really saw in him. What you wanted to emulate.
I see... Yes, I see!
True justice would be putting a smile on YOUR face, Euden!
Come again?
Prepare yourself! Justiiice...TICKLE!
GAH! S-stop that! This is— HA HA HA! This is undignified! HA HA HA HA HA!
*sigh* This is hopeless.
Something's wrong. These fiends' numbers aren't normal!
And those thieves with them—
Ya noticed too? The urn they're carryin' is controllin' the fiends.
SMAAAAAASH!
I heard a distant cry...for JUSTICE! Make way for the Karlsplosion, people!
Looks like you're outnumbered, my friends.
Which means it's time I joined the fray! Prepare yourselves, fiends!
Your timing's impeccable, Karl!
Everyone, fall in behind him! We'll clear the fiends out first!
Excellent work! That's the last of those!
Next, we strip that urn from the thieves and round them up!
Right. Any villains who'd draft an army of fiends to do their nefarious bidding deserve a double helping of JUSTICE!
PREPARE YOUR— Wait a second.
Now's really not the time for introspective pauses, Karl!
I helped these guys the other day!
They were being attacked by fiends, so I made with the justice.
Oh hey! It's you, buddy!
Didn't think the guy who helped us steal this urn would turn around and try to take it from us.
I did WHAT?!
Yeah. We tried to buy it off a black market fence, but he decided we looked like easy marks and made to gouge us.
Soon as we called the guy out on it, he used the damn thing to sic his pack of guard fiends on us.
Except that's when—
Karl showed up and took out the fiends.
Which let these jokers steal the urn.
We're proper thankful. This little gem's made all our jobs since go smooth as silk! Keh heh ha ha ha!
What have I done...?
You're basically an accomplice in all this, friend. Why not just let us go?
I'm not the hero... I'm one of the outlaws?
Ugh. I ain't got time for this!
Euden! Back me up! With the fiends gone, the two of us can finish this!
Er, right! I'm with you!
...Whew. One urn confiscated, and one pack'a thieves trussed up real tight. That's everything sorted.
Well, almost everything. Karl, how ya holding up there?
Everything I stood for was a lie... My life is a hollow mockery of justice...
Yikes.
Come now, Karl. We all make mistakes.
It's what we do after that matters.
What we do after... *inhale*
JUSTIIIIIIIIIIIIIIIICE!
Waugh?! That was a little sudden! And exceptionally loud...
You're right. I'll take some time to ponder what justice truly means to me! Ha HAA ha ha ha!
Well, at least he's back in high spirits.
I think I liked him better depressed.
Karl is moving slow? ...THAT Karl?
Yes, and he's off lost in his head in the middle of combat.
If this keeps up, it's only a matter of time before he ends up in some fiend's belly.
Think he's still mullin' things over after his little mistake earlier?
He did say somethin' about ponderin' the true meaning of justice.
Hmm, but how can we help him find his answer?
Bad, bad, very bad! You've gotta come to the village! HURRY!
Easy, now. Put down the weapon and let the woman go.
Heeelp! Let me go, you brute! I shall swoon!
You squeezed every last coin out of me, drove me into debt, raided my parents' estate, and gave it all to another man!
Yeah, and whose fault is it for being too stupid to see that?!
You're an empty bucket, loser! Now hurry up and kick it!
Rgh, clearly the man holding the woman at knifepoint is bad, yet her duplicity is the root cause!
So...which one do I smash? How is justice done?!
Enough... I'm through talking to you! This is farewell forever! HrrRAAAH!
No!
Aaah!
HRAH! ...Your blade lies broken, sir. Get ahold of your emotions.
Euden!
Aah... Curse you, woman. *sob* Curse you!
Ahh ha ha ha! A fine sight you are! You're pathetic!
Now, if you'll excuse me, I've got a date with my new lover.
You have a date with the authorities, madam.
They'll see you atone for the fraud you perpetrated against this man.
What?! No!
...You didn't hesitate at all. You stepped in and meted out perfectly balanced justice.
Me, I was paralyzed. Lost in worrying who was right or wrong.
I feel ashamed. Angry at myself!
Please, Euden! Teach me!
What do I need to do to be able to serve justice as you do?!
Believe me, I'm no avatar of justice.
Her life was in danger, so I acted.
But his grievances were also valid, so I held her accountable.
Nothing more.
I see... It isn't about what you do, but the cause that guides your actions.
I... I think I see it now!
I know what I want to do! What I must!
I'm glad to hear it!
Justice isn't some distant ideal to be chased!
It's in every act of consideration, every bit of concern, every chastisement! My true journey of justice begins here!
I am Karl! Man...
...of JUSTIIIIIIIIIIIIIICE!
Hellooo? Come on out, kids!
Your mothers are worried! They sent us to find you!
Yeesh, which one of the little geniuses thought it'd be a good idea to wander into the Banewood alone?
I sure hope they live long enough to learn better!
You shouldn't even joke about that. This place is home to dangerous fiends.
And the nasty weather limits visibility.
WaaAAAaAAAaaUGH!
The children!
Where are they?!
*sob* H-heeelp!
Anyone, please! HELP!
SKREEEEE!
Justiiice SCREAMING COMET SMAAASH!
Wh-who are you, mister?!
The name's Karl. The Karlsplosion! The Inkarldescent! Man...of JUSTICE!
Grrrrrr!
I bear you no grudge, fiends. Let these children be, and we'll leave your territory!
GrrrROAAAWR!
Not in the mood for diplomacy, eh? Justiiice SUPERNOVA EXPLOSION!
H-he cleared 'em all out in one hit!
The voices were coming from this direc— Karl?! What are you doing here?
I heard a pair of village children had gone missing, so I came running!
Both of them are safe and sound!
Oh, whew!
You were amazing, mister!
Thank you, little lady!
But I'm also very cross with you both. Do you know why?
Be...cause we went into the Banewood even though we weren't s'posed to?
Because you made your mother worry.
The other villagers told you it wasn't safe here, didn't they?
B-but we wanted a secret base someplace everybody else was too scared to go! It was gonna be awesome...
Being awesome is definitely important.
But being considerate of others' feelings is even more important. It doesn't get any awesomer than that.
Once you've got that down, you'll be able to bring a smile to people's faces. And that's what I call justice!
...Justice!
Heh. Karl sounds like a hero over there.
Yep. That's the real deal right there.
Now, shout it to the heavens! All together now...
JUSTIIIICE!!!
